Review: This app is missing essential information and features that prepay customers need. Firstly it doesn't display credit expiry dates so you can't see when you next need to top up before they will take your existing credit. The app also doesn't notify you when your credit is about to expire, even though...Full ReviewThis app is missing essential information and features that prepay customers need. Firstly it doesn't display credit expiry dates so you can't see when you next need to top up before they will take your existing credit. The app also doesn't notify you when your credit is about to expire, even though there are notifications for just about everything else. Nor does it allow you to automatically top up your account by the minimum amount in order to avoid losing your credit.

I want to uninstall the bloody thing and it won't let me. [edit after developer reply: Yes, the phone was bought for me as a gift from Vodafone and yes, I know that's why I can't uninstall it. But simply because a phone is bought from Vodafone is not a good reason to have a vendor-based app on it wh...Full ReviewI want to uninstall the bloody thing and it won't let me. [edit after developer reply: Yes, the phone was bought for me as a gift from Vodafone and yes, I know that's why I can't uninstall it. But simply because a phone is bought from Vodafone is not a good reason to have a vendor-based app on it which cannot be uninstalled. At the very least, in cases like mine the person who buys the phone as a gift might not know which network the individual they are buying for would prefer to use. People can move their mobile phones from one network to another, why should they be forced to keep the Vodafone app installed when they are no longer using Vodafone as a provider? One star.]
